Please use your browser's Help function to learn how to enable JavaScript.</p><p>Learn more about JavaScript enabled <a class="browser-support" href="http://www.capitalone.com/online-banking/browser-support/" alt="Supported Browser">browsers our sites support.</a></p></div></div></div></div></noscript><div id="smartbanner" class="android shown" style="display: none;" data-persist-unav="true"><div class="sb-container"><a href="#" class="sb-close">×</a> <span class="sb-icon" style="background-image: url('/assets/compass/contentful/1h6lncjoeq27/6eh2ar4ZKoSaW6eAmYw0w6/5a8231e5a53043406ee8ca9471f70aaf/mobile-app-icon.png')"></span><div class="sb-info"><strong>Capital One Mobile</strong> <span>Capital One Service LLC</span> <span>FREE - In Google Play</span></div><a href="market://details?id=com.konylabs.capitalone" class="sb-button"><span>VIEW</span></a></div></div><script>
   (function smartBanner () {
     /*
     ** iOS Devices
     ** Utilizes a meta tag to render a safari smart banner, not accessible
     ** within the dom (iOS magic). BC this does not require the template ele,
     ** and only the meta tag, create tag, and destroy the template.
     */

     var smartLink = 'https://smart.link/';
     var kochavaSmartLinkMap = {
         '/': {
             smartLinkId: "58769937fc597"
         },
         '/ent-signin/': {
             smartLinkId: "589a10bc405f4"
         },
         '/ent-spanish/': {
             smartLinkId: "589a4207855a0"
         }
     }

     function addKochavaSmartlink () {
         var path = window.location.pathname;
         if (kochavaSmartLinkMap[path]) {
          var smartLinkId = kochavaSmartLinkMap[path].smartLinkId;
          $('body').append('<img src="' + smartLink + smartLinkId + '" height="1" width="1" border ="0" />');
         }
     }

     if (window.c1SiteVars.deviceInfo.os !== undefined && window.c1SiteVars.deviceInfo.os.indexOf('iPhone') !== -1) {
         // Create the iOS meta tag.
         var iosMeta = document.createElement('meta');
         iosMeta.name = "apple-itunes-app";
         iosMeta.content = "app-id=407558537";
         document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(iosMeta);
         // Kochava tracking
         addKochavaSmartlink();
         // Destroy the element. (Not needed for iOS)
         $('#smartbanner').remove();
     }

     else if (window.c1SiteVars.deviceInfo.os !== undefined && window.c1SiteVars.deviceInfo.os.indexOf('Android') !== -1) {
         // Check localStorage, if item is expired, proceed to setup watcher.
         $('#smartbanner').css('display', 'block');
         checkLocalStorage();
         closeBannerWatcher();
         $('.sb-close').removeAttr('target');
         // Kochava tracking
         addKochavaSmartlink();
     }

     /*
     ** Unsupported Devices
     ** It's not android/iOS, destroy the element.
     */

     else {
       $('#smartbanner').remove();
     }

     /*
     ** Helpers
     */

     // Checks local storage to proceed based on item expiration.
     function checkLocalStorage() {
       var sbLocal = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('sbClose'));
       if (sbLocal) {
         if (sbLocal.closed && sbLocal.expiration > Date.now()) {
           $('#smartbanner').remove();
           return false;
         } else if (sbLocal.closed && sbLocal.expiration < Date.now()) {
           localStorage.removeItem('sbClose');
         }
       }
     }

     // Initialize a watcher for closing the smart banner.
     function closeBannerWatcher() {
         $('.sb-close').on('click', function() {
           // Destroy the element.
           $('#smartbanner').remove();

           // Set ExpirationDate = current time + 14 days.
           var expirationDate = Date.now();
           expirationDate += 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 14;

           // Create object, and set in localStorage.
           var localStorageItem = {
             closed: true,
             expiration: expirationDate
           }
           localStorage.setItem('sbClose', JSON.stringify(localStorageItem));
         });
     }
   })();

  var deviceType = getDeviceType();

  // Only loads images once device type is recognized.
  // Avoids loading 3 separate responsive images on mobile/tablet devices.
  function loadImages() {
    $("[lazy-load-src]").each(function(){
      var lazyLoadSrcUrl = $(this).attr("lazy-load-src");
      var mobileSrc = $(this).attr("mobile-load-src") || lazyLoadSrcUrl;
      var tabletSrc = $(this).attr("tablet-load-src") || lazyLoadSrcUrl;
      switch (deviceType) {
        case 'portrait-primary':
          lazyLoadSrcUrl = mobileSrc;
          break;
        case 'landscape-primary':
          lazyLoadSrcUrl = tabletSrc;
        case 'tablet':
          lazyLoadSrcUrl = tabletSrc;
          break;
        default:
          lazyLoadSrcUrl = lazyLoadSrcUrl;
      }

      // if img set src, if div set bg image
      if($(this).is("img")){
        $(this).attr("src",lazyLoadSrcUrl);
      } else if($(this).is("div")){
        $(this).css("background-image", "url("+lazyLoadSrcUrl+")");
      } else if($(this).is("source")){
        $(this).attr("srcset",lazyLoadSrcUrl);
      }
    });
  }

  // Reload images on orientation change for mobile device types
  if (isMobile()) {
    window.addEventListener("orientationchange", function() {
        deviceType = getDeviceType();
        loadImages();
    });
  }

  function isTablet(){
    if(window.c1SiteVars){
      return (window.c1SiteVars.deviceInfo.type.indexOf('tablet') !== -1);
    }
    return false;
  }

  function isMobile(){
    if(window.c1SiteVars){
      return (window.c1SiteVars.deviceInfo.type.indexOf('mobile') !== -1);
    }
    return false;
  }

  function getDeviceType(){
    if(isTablet()){
      return 'tablet';
    } else if (isMobile()){
      if (isAndroid() && window.screen & window.screen.orientation){
        return window.screen.orientation.type;
      } else if (screen.orientation) {
          return screen.orientation.type;
      }
    } else {
      return 'desktop';
    }
  }

  function isAndroid(){
      return (window.c1SiteVars.deviceInfo.os.indexOf('Android') !== -1);
  }
